lead_paragraph: Former U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro looms as a danger man at the U.S. Open after barreling into the second round in straight sets over fellow Argentine Diego Schwartzman on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Former Champion Del Potro Roars Into Second Round
headline.main: Former Champion Del Potro Roars Into Second Round
